name: Swedish Meatballs I
author: Jessica Jones
summary: This is one of my husband's favorites. I created it using several other Swedish meatball recipes that didn't quite make the grade.
ingredients: ¼ cup dry cream of wheat cereal
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large bowl, whisk together the egg and the milk
Add the beef, cream of wheat and onion and mix well
Place balls on a lightly greased baking sheet
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for about 20 minutes
Drain meatballs on paper towels, if needed
Then place meatballs in a lightly greased 2 quart casserole dish
In a separate medium bowl, combine the soups with the evaporated milk, stirring until smooth
Bake uncovered at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for another 40 minutes
